```
$ ethdo block info --verbose
Slot: 88

  Execution block number: 165
  Base fee per gas: 7 Wei
  Block hash: 0xb4ea3d957370868bd8424f348425101a7fdc34b871ee6c23bedb7dd00989f5d4
  Parent hash: 0xab2ab9d7722fd1c52e40aeef474586da52862f1673981262d515eb4b7bc84e6d
  Fee recipient: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000001
  Gas limit: 4926987
  Gas used: 0
  Timestamp: 2022-03-11 14:17:40 +0000 GMT (1647008260)
  Prev RANDAO: 0x9c30addd677ca8f8f0e5cb7efb5038592f60445b7c72203f9274d0f3842bdad1
  Receipts root: 0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421
